mapper.select: SELECT tenant_id, login_id, password, corp_name, corp_id, city, street, zipcode, ceo_name, created_at, updated_at FROM tb_tenant ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_tenant (login_id, password, corp_name, corp_id, city, street, zipcode, ceo_name, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{corpName}, #{corpId}, #{city}, #{street}, #{zipcode}, #{ceoName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_tenant SET login_id = #{loginId}, password = #{password}, corp_name = #{corpName}, corp_id = #{corpId}, city = #{city}, street = #{street}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, ceo_name = #{ceoName}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE tenant_id = #{id}
